Package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Encapsulates data and logic regarding the Game object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int boardSize, int playerCount)
    Constructs a game instance with the two parameters that the server requires to start a game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String key, int boardSize, int playerCount, List<Board> boards, boolean started, boolean finished, boolean yourTurn)
      Initializes final fields in the absence of Gson initialization.
      Parameters:
      key - Unique key for the Game instance.
      boardSize - Selected grid size that the game will be played on.
      playerCount - Number of players in a game.
      boards - List of every player's board.
      started - Indicates whether game has started.
      finished - Indicates whether game has finished.
      yourTurn - Indicates whether it is the user's turn.

    • Game

      public Game(int boardSize, int playerCount)
      Constructs a game instance with the two parameters that the server requires to start a game.
      Parameters:
      boardSize - Selected grid size that the game will be played on.
      playerCount - Number of players in a game.
